news.summary: A tool used by doctors and nurses to protect themselves from the coronavirus is flawed but a modification can improve it, researchers say.

news.title: Variant of Usual PCR May Speed COVID-19 Testing
news.summary: (Reuters) - Researchers say a variation of the gold standard polymerase chain reaction (PCR) test for diagnosing COVID-19 removes unnecessary steps and allows faster and less expensive testing, with at least equal accuracy.
